metadata.Title: CVE-2019-2118 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In various functions of Parcel.cpp, there are uninitialized or partially initialized stack variables. These could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-130161842.

criterions.comment: android package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
